org.talend.sdk.component.api.service.http

Interface Configurer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    OAuth1.Configurer

    public interface Configurer
    Callback to configure the connection more deeply. Typically used to configure timeouts.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  Configurer.ConfigurerConfiguration
      Represents the potential ConfigurerOption parameters of the invocation.
      static interface  Configurer.Connection
      Represents actions doable on a connection.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void configure(Configurer.Connection connection, Configurer.ConfigurerConfiguration configuration) 

    • Method Detail

      • configure

        void configure(Configurer.Connection connection,
               Configurer.ConfigurerConfiguration configuration)
        Parameters:
        connection - the current connection to customize.
        configuration - the configuration of the invocation if any.
